00082   bool file_check(std::string const &file, mode_t mask = S_IFMT) {
00083     struct stat st;
00084     return 0==stat(file.c_str(), &st) && (mask&st.st_mode);
00085   }
00098   std::string short_name(std::string const &file_name) {
00099     size_t slash = file_name.find_last_of('/');
00100     
00101     if( std::string::npos!=slash )
00102       return std::string(file_name, slash+1);
00103     return file_name;
00104   }

00124 std::string LogManager::locate(std::string const &file, bool &found) const {
00125   if( file.empty() )
00126     found = false;
00127   else {
00128     found = file_check(file);
00129     if( !found && '/'!=file[0] ) {
00130       std::list<std::string>::const_iterator i = m_searchPath.begin();
00131       for(; m_searchPath.end()!=i; ++i ) {
00132        std::string loc = *i+'/'+file;
00133        found = file_check(loc);
00134        if( found )
00135          return loc;
00136       }
00137     }
00138   }
00139   return file;
00140 }
00141 
00142 bool LogManager::addSearchPath(std::string const &path) {
00143   if( !path.empty() ) {
00144     if( '.'==path[0] || file_check(path, S_IFDIR) ) {
00145       // This is a directory -> add it to the path
00146       m_searchPath.push_back(path);
00147       return true;
00148     }
00149   }
00150   return false;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void LogManager::loadSearchPath() {
00154   char *home = getenv(TREX_ENV);
00155   if( NULL!=home ) {
00156     std::string home_path(home);
00157     // Right now I am adding $TREX_HOME as it is
00158     // In  the future I may have to add $TREX_HOME/extra
00159     // -- or whatever I decide -- instead
00160     addSearchPath(home_path);
00161   }
00162   char *path = getenv(SEARCH_ENV);
00163   if( NULL!=path ) {
00164     // column separated list
00165     std::string path_str(path);
00166     static boost::char_delimiters_separator<char> sep(false, "", ":");
00167     boost::tokenizer<> tok(path_str, sep);
00168     for(boost::tokenizer<>::iterator beg=tok.begin(); beg!=tok.end();++beg) {
00169       addSearchPath(*beg);
00170     }
00171   }
00172 }
00173 
00174 std::string const &LogManager::logPath() {
00175   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock lock(m_inited);
00176 
00177   if( !*m_inited ) {
00178     if( m_path.empty() ) {
00179       createLatest();
00180     } else if( !file_check(m_path) ) { 
00181       int ret = mkdir(m_path.c_str(), 0777);
00182       if( 0==ret ) {
00183        throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: Unable to create log directory :");
00184       }
00185     }
00186     std::string cfg = m_path+"/cfg";
00187     int ret = mkdir(cfg.c_str(), 0777);
00188     if( 0!=ret && EEXIST!=errno )
00189       throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: error while creating cfg dir");
00190     m_syslog.open(m_path+'/'+TREX_LOG_FILE);
00191     m_syslog<<"TREX version "<<TREX::version::str();
00192     loadSearchPath();
00193     *m_inited = true;
00194   }
00195   return m_path;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void LogManager::createLatest() {
00199   char *base_dir = getenv(LOG_DIR_ENV);
00200   char dated_dir[17];
00201   
00202   if( NULL==base_dir ) {
00203     throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: $"LOG_DIR_ENV" is not set");
00204   }
00205   dated_dir[16] = '\0';
00206 
00207   time_t cur_time;
00208   time(&cur_time);
00209   strftime(dated_dir, 16, "/%Y.%j.", gmtime(&cur_time));
00210   
00211   std::string latest = base_dir;
00212   std::string cur_basis = base_dir;
00213   size_t len = latest.length()+30;
00214   char *buf = new char[len+1];
00215   std::memset(buf, 0, len+1);
00216   latest = latest+'/'+LATEST_DIR;
00217   cur_basis += dated_dir;
00218   int ret = readlink(latest.c_str(), buf, len-1);
00219   size_t last = 0;
00220   if( ret>0 ) {
00221     // latest link exists and point to something
00222     size_t b_len = cur_basis.length();
00223     if( 0==cur_basis.compare(0, b_len, buf, b_len) ) {
00224       std::istringstream iss(std::string(buf, b_len));
00225       iss>>last;
00226     }
00227     unlink(latest.c_str());
00228   }
00229   delete[] buf;
00230   for(unsigned i=1; i<MAX_LOG_ATTEMPT; ++i) {
00231     std::ostringstream oss;
00232     oss<<cur_basis<<std::setw(2)<<std::setfill('0')<<(last+i);
00233     int ret = mkdir(oss.str().c_str(), 0777);
00234     if( 0==ret ) {
00235       m_path = oss.str();
00236       symlink(m_path.c_str(), latest.c_str());
00237       return;
00238     } else if( EEXIST!=errno )
00239       throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager: error while trying to create log dir");
00240   }
00241   throw ErrnoExcept("LogManager", "Too many attempts ... clean up your "
00242                   "log directory");
00243 }

00245 std::string LogManager::file_name(std::string const &short_name) {
00246   return logPath()+'/'+short_name;
00247 }

00249 std::string LogManager::getCfgPath() {
00250   return file_name("cfg/");
00251 }
00252 
00253 std::string LogManager::use(std::string const &file_name, bool &found) {
00254   std::string dest_name = getCfgPath()+short_name(file_name);
00255 
00256   std::string located = locate(file_name, found);
00257   if( found ) {
00258     std::ifstream src(located.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00259   
00260     if( !!src ) {
00261       syslog()<<"- Using file "<<located;
00262       std::ofstream dest(dest_name.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00263 
00264       dest<<src.rdbuf();
00265       src.close();
00266       dest.close();
00267     } else
00268       throw ErrnoExcept("File \""+located+'\"');
00269   }
00270   return located;
00271 }

00273 TextLog &LogManager::syslog() {
00274   return m_syslog;

00277 internals::LogEntry LogManager::syslog(std::string const &txt) {
00278   return m_syslog<<('['+txt+"] ");
00279 }

00281 bool LogManager::setLogLevel(LogLevel lvl) {
00282   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00283   if( !*m_inited ) {
00284     m_level = lvl;
00285     return true;
00286   }
00287   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change verbosity level after init."<<std::endl;
00288   return false;
00289 }
00290 
00291 bool LogManager::setLogPath(std::string const &path) {
00292   SharedVar<bool>::scoped_lock guard(m_inited);
00293   if( !*m_inited ) {
00294     m_path = path;
00295     return true;
00296   }
00297   syslog("LogManager")<<"Cannot change log path after init."<<std::endl;
00298   return false;
00299 }
